exam.question: John said that he didn’t quite ______ and asked me to repeat what I had said.

answer.explain: catch on： 理解， 明白。句意： 约翰说他不是很明白， 并要我重复一遍。snatch up： 抓住； summon up： 鼓起(勇气等)； watch out： 当心， 注意。

sentences.sContent: I snatched a glance at the mirror.
...but it is not necessary to worry they will snatch jobs from us...

trans.tranOther: If you snatch an opportunity, you take it quickly. If you snatch something to eat or a rest, you have it quickly in between doing other things.

trans.tranCn: 夺，夺走，抢走；一下子拉，一把抓住；抓住机会做，抽空做
trans.tranOther: to take something away from someone with a quick, often violent, movement
a short part of a conversation, song etc that you hear
